name: ExpenseOverflow
0:
”Alexa, open Expense Overflow”
”set the limit to ten dollars”
”i spent five dollars”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: expense overflow
des:
Expense Overflow allows you to control your spending activity rather than letting your spending activity control you. Set a limit under which you would like to keep your expenses and then start logging your expenses.

Know how far you are from breaching the limit.

Feature breakdown

Set a limit
Utterance: set the limit to {dollar} dollars (and [cent} cents)

This sets your limit to the desired amount.

Log your expenses
Utterance: log/deduct/I have spent {dollar} dollars and {cent} cents

This lets you log your expenses. Each time you log, you will get to know how far you are from breaching the limit.

Reset
If you make a mistake in your utterance simply ask Alexa to reset.

How Are you doing
Utterance: How Am I Doing

Know how you've been faring with respect to keeping your expense under control.

Success Factor
Utterance: What is my success factor

Know how many times you have been successful in keeping your expenses under the set limit.

The skill is flexible. You can set the limit as per your desire: a day, a month, a year. The period doesn't matter.

Please feel to contact the developers alexa.apps@alexaapps.io
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
